slogan_sub: The answer is up to you, and the question is up to us
gameDescription: Answer correctly, and deduct the number of points you won from the other team's points.
playingModeseDescription: It is a fun cultural game suitable for all ages, testing your group's knowledge. The game includes all types of questions according to the selected category.
knowledgeModeseDescription: It is a fun cultural game suitable for all ages, testing your group's knowledge. The game includes all types of questions according to the selected category.
aboutMojoDescription: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur. Magna convallis magna pretium morbi at ut ut adipiscing. Posuere iaculis iaculis etiam ultrices lectus. Morbi in at blandit potenti vulputate scelerisque metus imperdiet purus. Lacus mauris pharetra gravida.
lifeLinesNote: Use them before you see the question
callFriendNote: Your friend who knows everything, it's time to call him!
secondChanceNote: In case of wrong option or doubt, you can take another chance to guess right answer.

errors.passwordInvalid: Password must be at least 8 characters and include uppercase, lowercase, and number.
errors.nameRequired: First name and Last name is required.
errors.maxCategories: Please select a maximum of 6 categories.
errors.teamNameMaxLength: Team name must not exceed 20 characters.

creditsInfo: These game credits will be used for creating games.
currencyInfo: This is the real currency, that will be used to buy game packs/credits.
purchaseHistory: Your history of buying pack of games.
playLocalNote: An interactive group game in which we test your knowledge and culture
categoryInstructions: 3 categories for your team, and 3 categories for the opposing team, for a total of 6 categories with 36 different questions. Choose the categories carefully to ensure the greatest chance of winning.
playGlobalDescription: Make your own Room and invite players to play with you and compete globally.
roomModalNote: Enter Room code to participate in it.
creditInfo: Creating game requires 1 credit. if you win this game credit will be refunded.
confirmExit: Do you want to exit the game?
opposingCategories: and 3 categories for the opposing team.
game_library: Game library, each game has a different field.
questions_divided_levels: The questions in these games are divided into 3 different levels.
studentsDescription: A series of questions for students of every age group
chooseAcademicLevelDescription: You can choose a study stage from the following stages.
selectSubjectDescription: You can choose the study subject from the following subjects.
reviewStudy: Review your study of the material through the five available games.
chooseGames: You can choose one or more games.
kidsSectionDescription: A special interface for children. We test their knowledge according to their ages
refundIfTeamNotJoined: if user does not select categories in this time , game will restart searching.
profileDescription: Your personal profile on mojo system.
question: Question
player1MaxCategory: Player 1 has reached the maximum category limit. Now Player 2 turn.
player2MaxCategory: Player 2 has reached the maximum category limit. Now start the game.
categoryTimeoutNote: if user does not select categories in this time, game will restart searching.
commissionNote: you will get the credits as a commission on your categories usage
resetPasswordNote: We will email you an OTP to reset your password.
enterOtp: Enter the OTP we sent to your email.
confirmPasswordMismatch: Confirm password does not match to new password.
passwordResetOtpSent: Password reset OTP has been sent to your email.
secondChanceNote2: You want to take 2 turns in case of any doubt or wrong answer? Use this.
freeModeSubtitle: Upgrade to Premium for unlimited games & fun!
